title: What are the forms needed for a simple divorce no kids no property in san bernardino??
question: I need to start a divorce from my partner, no kids, no properties, what forms do I need in san bernardino county? I live in Big bear which court should I file it in?
question_tags: Divorce,Uncontested divorce,Dividing debts in a divorce,Child support,Alimony,Divorce and bankruptcy,Bankruptcy,Debt,Nondischargeable debt and alimony,Bankruptcy and debt,Divorce and family,Family law,Contempt of court
answers:
File matter in San Bernardino Superior court.
Link explains process:
https://www.courts.ca.gov/selfhelp-divorce.htm?rdeLocaleAttr=en
